channel.title: Phpbb 3.0 skin
channel.description: anyone here make phpbb 3.0 skin? or can help me with my skin. i bought a skin from http://www.extremepixels.com/ for my phpbb but the problem is that it can only be used for 2.0. so i was wondering if someone here can help me ethier make a new skin for my site or help me fix the skin i bought from http://www.extremepixels.com/ so it can work for my phpbb 3.0 here is the skin i bought http://www.extremepixels.net/phpbb/index.php?s=68 this is the demo so yea
